lead_paragraph: The talk gets heated in Youngstown, Ohio, when residents discuss whether a New York billionaire’s ideas can revitalize a struggling Rust Belt town.

headline.print_headline: Trump a Blue-Collar Hero? Ask in a Blue-Collar Town
headline.main: Trump a Working-Class Hero? A Blue-Collar Town Debates His Credentials

snippet: The talk gets heated in Youngstown, Ohio, when residents discuss whether a New York billionaire’s ideas can revitalize a struggling Rust Belt town....
abstract: Youngstown, Ohio, residents are divided over whether New York City billionaire Donald J Trump can speak for working class in struggling blue-collar city; supporters distrustful of traditional politicians admire candidate's penchant for unvarnished opinions, financial independence and stances on immigration and trade (Series: Anxious in America).
